user.title: Connect to your Creality Printer
user.description:
Enter the IP address and port of your Creality printer.

K1SE and newer printers use port 9999. Older printers (Halot series) may use port 18188.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the printer, check your input and try again.

success.title: Success
success.description: Successfully connected to your Creality Printer.
